mapper.insert: insert into risk_health_record_info (id, record_id, police_id, height, weight, high_density_lipoprotein, low_density_lipoprotein, triglyceride, cholesterol, receive_compression, diastolic_pressure, blood_sugar, serum_uric_acid, is_prostate, prostate_desc, is_major_diseases, is_heart, is_tumor_antigen, is_orthopaedics, creation_date, update_date ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{policeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{highDensityLipoprotein,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lowDensityLipoprotein,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{triglyceride,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cholesterol,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{receiveCompression,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{diastolicPressure,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bloodSugar,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{serumUricAcid,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{isProstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prostateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMajorDiseases,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isHeart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isTumorAntigen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isOrthopaedics,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update risk_health_record_info set record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, police_id = #{policeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, high_density_lipoprotein = #{highDensityLipoprotein,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, low_density_lipoprotein = #{lowDensityLipoprotein,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, triglyceride = #{triglyceride,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, cholesterol = #{cholesterol,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, receive_compression = #{receiveCompression,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, diastolic_pressure = #{diastolicPressure,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, blood_sugar = #{bloodSugar,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, serum_uric_acid = #{serumUricAcid,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, is_prostate = #{isProstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prostate_desc = #{prostateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_major_diseases = #{isMajorDiseases,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_heart = #{isHeart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_tumor_antigen = #{isTumorAntigen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_orthopaedics = #{isOrthopaedics,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, record_id, police_id, height, weight, high_density_lipoprotein, low_density_lipoprotein, triglyceride, cholesterol, receive_compression, diastolic_pressure, blood_sugar, serum_uric_acid, is_prostate, prostate_desc, is_major_diseases, is_heart, is_tumor_antigen, is_orthopaedics, creation_date, update_date from risk_health_record_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, record_id, police_id, height, weight, high_density_lipoprotein, low_density_lipoprotein, triglyceride, cholesterol, receive_compression, diastolic_pressure, blood_sugar, serum_uric_acid, is_prostate, prostate_desc, is_major_diseases, is_heart, is_tumor_antigen, is_orthopaedics, creation_date, update_date from risk_health_record_info
select * from risk_health_record_info where record_id = #{recordId} limit 1
